title: President Tebboune sends written message to UAEâ€™s President
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune addressed, today, a written message to his brother, the President of the United Arab Emirates, brotherly country, Sheikh Mohamed Ben Zayed Al-Nahyane, as part of fraternal relations and permanent contact between the leaders of the two countries, and in consecration of their common will to promote the Algerian-Emirati relations and to continue efforts to defend the causes of the Arab nation.

The message was handed over by Ambassador Salah Boucha, in his capacity as special envoy of the President of the Republic, who was received today in Abu Dhabi by the President of the United Arab Emirates, a brother country.
